body:
## About Holms Smart Gun (Reilly)

Reilly is a 15-year-old, 15.2h gelding with proven show experience and an easy-going temperament. With two successful years in the Silver Series and playoff qualifications both years, he's ready to take a confident rider through the 2026 show season.

### Show Experience

- Competed in Silver Series for the past two years
- Qualified for playoffs both years
- Experience at off-property clinics and schooling shows
- Comfortable showing away from home

### Temperament & Training

Reilly is the definition of easy-going with no buck, bolt, or rear. He likes being ridden to jumps and is perfectly suited for heights between crossrails and 2'3". His calm, reliable nature makes him an excellent choice for building confidence and gaining show mileage.

### Ground Manners

- Baths and clips without issue
- Loads and trailers easily
- Ties quietly
- Stands for the farrier like a gentleman

### Perfect For

- Confident junior rider looking for show experience
- Adult amateur seeking a reliable, easy-going mount
- Rider wanting to compete in the 2'3" and under divisions
- Someone looking for a no-drama, straightforward partner

### Maintenance Requirements

- Requires front shoes
- Regular PEMF therapy

### Lease Details

Available for lease starting November 2025 for the 2026 show season. Contact us for pricing and lease terms.

Located in Newtonville, Ontario.
